name: Kist Magic Cookie Assortment Tin Red
description: Wholesome fresh local butter, sun ripened fresh wheat, delightful roasted sesame seeds, magical choco chips makes these yummies come alive with mouthwatering richness and flavour. Treat your self to the assortment of sugar sprinkled butter cookies, sesame cookies and chocolate chip cookies.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
